r.s: Tensor is a library and extension that provides objects for scientific computing in PHP.
r.d: Tensor is a library and extension that provides objects for scientific computing in PHP.
r.n: - Implemented Singular Value Decomposition (SVD) - Implemented matrix (Moore-Penrose) pseudoinverse - Tensor objects now throw namespaced exceptions - Optimized Reduced Row Echelon Form (RREF) - Optimize eigendecomposition for symmetric matrices
